response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am confident it will serve you exceptionally well. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This amount reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also acknowledges its importance to you. I believe this is a fair and reasonable offer that respects both the product's worth and your interest in it. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially making this valuable asset yours.", "product_price": 950000}
